sub_title: Lawyer | Linguist - Certified translator English and Dutch - Text & Transcreation NL
summary:
Qualified Dutch lawyer/linguist | Marketing and "transcreation" | Legal translations (civil law) | financial translations (investments, accounting) | Technical translations (energy & environment, mechanical engineering, maritime and IT)
I also enjoy doing interpreting and training assignments.
Sworn translator in the Netherlands for EN-NL & NL-EN
